example.parse: (TOP (S (VP (IV3FS+IV تَهْدِف) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL تَجَمُّعات) (NP (NOUN سَبْت) (NP (DET+NOUN الزَئِير)))) (PP-CLR (PREP إِلَى) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN إِسماع) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-DTV (NP (DET+NOUN العالَم) (DET+ADJ الغَربِي)) (CONJ وَ) (NP (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC تَحْدِيداً)) (NOUN_PROP أَمْرِيكا))) (NP-OBJ (NP (ADJP (ADJ_COMP أَعْلَى) (NP (NOUN صُوت)))) (PP (PREP لِ) (NP (NP (NP (DET+NOUN العَرَب)) (CONJ وِ) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL المُسْلِمِين)) (CONJ وِ) (NP (NOUN احْرار) (NP (DET+NOUN العالَم)))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL الغاضِبِين) (PP (PREP عَلَى) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG مُواصَلَة) (NP (NP (NOUN اِحْتِلال) (NP (NOUN_PROP فِلِسْطِين))) (CONJ وِ) (NP (NOUN تَشْرِيد) (NP (NOUN_NUM مَلايِين) (NP (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL اللاجِئِين))))))))))))))) (PUNC .)))
